attr.title: Candle Prick
attr.desc: Candle Prick is a crunchy pixel adventure about stabbing enemies and using them as extensions of yourself to solve increasingly complex puzzles. Simple mechanics will give way to complicated scenarios as you discover different ways to interact with the environment.
attr.inst:
Demo is included and Ready To Run. Demo is fun, but BUY THE FULL GAME for the REAL challenge from here:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1920700/Candle_Prick/
Once you've got it in your library, right click it, then 'Manage-Browse Local Files', Then COPY
 "Candle Prick.pck" 
into the gamedata folder, and REMOVE the current, "Candle Prick Patched.pck" Demo file, otherwise it will not prioritize the Full Game.
If your Games not FullScreen, go to Options-Options-Video-Fullscreen.
